name: SubTeaLaser
description:
A 2d shooter made with GDevelop for GDevelop game jam : the theme was: build and rebuild, and in this game you build and rebuild your water harvester. Controls and scenario are in the game.

Credits:

Made with Gdevelop 5.0, JFXR, PISKEL, GIMP 2.10 and Bosca Ceoil, with an original idea from rahan459.

Original music.

Have fun and try to have 50000 points (if you succeed, please post a screenshot in the comments!).

Note: the sound might take a little time to load.
